short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A beautiful dashboard for Merch by Amazon. It updates as you sell and notifies you instantly about new sales with a cha-ching sound.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PrettyMerch is #1 most downloaded and top-rated extension for Merch by Amazon Sellers.

âœ” Beautiful dashboard to monitor your most important metrics
âœ” Real-time notifications for new sales with the most satisfying "Cha-Ching"
âœ” Detailed analytics for your sales, all the way back to day 1
âœ” Powerful Product Manager to easily filter and sort your products
âœ” ðŸ†• Research Tool so you can discover upcoming trends first

PrettyMerch provides you with a complete toolkit of features, right inside your Merch by Amazon account, helping you save time and sell more products.

ðŸ†• Trademark Search Tool
â–¸ Instantly search for Registered and Filed trademarks in all the available marketplaces
â–¸ International and European trademarks are also included in the search results
â–¸ PrettyMerch indexes all trademarks and makes sure you always receive the most updated results
â–¸ With Trademark Search you can keep your account safe by making sure that you are not including trademarked words in your design and text 

ðŸ†• Research Tool
â–¸ Our brand new Research Tool allows you to quickly filter through Merch products on Amazon and discover best selling designs and upcoming trends before the competition
â–¸ We continuously monitor Amazon search results and update our database with the most recent information for millions of products
â–¸ Find Best Sellers, products with the Lowest BSR, Future Trends and New Designs with a single click
â–¸ Use our Product Analyzer to view the most up-to-date, detailed analysis of every product. 

ðŸ–¥ Dashboard
â–¸ Todays sales; See a list of products sold together with a thumbnail to help recognise the product
â–¸ It updates "as you sell" and notifies you of new sales with an iconic "Ka-Ching" sound, even if the browser is closed
â–¸ Products are shown in the order in which they sold (most recent at the top)
â–¸ List of the Top 10 Best Sellers by units and royalties in the last 30 days
â–¸ Summary of you sales for Today, Yesterday, Week, Month and Previous Month
â–¸ All Time Sales; so you know when you're eligible for a tier up
â–¸ Chart of sales for the last 8 days
â–¸ Shirts which are in under review or in processing
â–¸ Total designs rejected, so can keep an eye on it
â–¸ Your Tier, upload limits and shirts uploaded

ðŸ¥¼ Product Manager
â–¸ View ALL your product details, even the details that Amazon doesn't show
â–¸ Bulk Edit; perfect for updating prices on multiple products
â–¸ Bulk Delete; perfect for clearing your catalogue from old/removed products
â–¸ Filter and search based on:
  â–¸ Title, Brand, Bullets, Description and ASIN
  â–¸ Reviews
  â–¸ BSR
  â–¸ Availability (if a product is buyable or not)
  â–¸ Total Units Sold, Royalties and Date of Last Sale
  â–¸ Date Created and Last Updated
  â–¸ Price
  â–¸ Days until Removal
  â–¸ + more

ðŸ“ˆ Analytics
â–¸ Get detailed analytics of your sales for any time period for any marketplace
â–¸ Charts by day/month
â–¸ Best selling products
â–¸ Best days/months, 
â–¸ Averages per day/month, 
â–¸ Product performance, 
â–¸ List of items sold which you can filter, sort and search 
â–¸ Probably the most detailed sales analytics you can get for Merch

ðŸ”” Notifications
â–¸ Notification when you're logged out
â–¸ Notification Merch by Amazon posts a new message
â–¸ Notification when you're tiered up
â–¸ Notification when your earnings have been poste

ðŸ”ƒ Auto Re-Login 
â–¸ Keeps you logged in to your account continuously. No more getting logged out every hour

âž• More:
â–¸ View royalties on the charts
â–¸ Click on any bar on the chart to view sales
â–¸ Click on any of the sales widgets to view the sales for that period
â–¸ View detailed analytics for your sales, such as the top selling product types, fit types and colors
